context_of_use: The urban mobility planner receives notifications regarding the impact of mobility measures on neighborhoods.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: increase fairness in urban mobility measures
description: Get notified when a mobility measure disproportionately disadvantages a neighborhood.
triggering_event: A mobility measure is implemented that may affect neighborhood fairness.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner is logged into the Urban Mobility Management System.
A mobility measure has been implemented.
postconditions: The urban mobility planner receives a notification regarding the neighborhood impact.
assumptions: The system has the capability to analyze the impact of mobility measures on neighborhoods.
requirements_met: The system shall notify the urban mobility planner if a measure disadvantages a neighborhood.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the criteria for determining neighborhood disadvantage.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner → System detects a mobility measure that may disadvantage a neighborhood.
2. System → System sends a notification to the urban mobility planner regarding the neighborhood impact.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the measure does not disadvantage any neighborhood, then no notification is sent.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the notification fails to send, then the system logs the error and alerts the urban mobility planner.
